summary: This document is an email regarding budgetary quotes for a camera system upgrade at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 7, 2018. It appears to be internal administrative correspondence related to facility maintenance or security upgrades.

events.title: Submission of Camera System Upgrade Quotes
events.description: An email is sent containing budgetary quotes from 'Nice' for a camera system upgrade at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 7, 2018, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's 2008 conviction but before his 2019 arrest.
It concerns budgetary quotes for a camera system upgrade at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The email subject and attachments suggest it is routine administrative correspondence regarding facility security infrastructure.
No named individuals are mentioned in the provided text.
